name: PR0J3CT0 01
description:
This game is still in development, if you are interested on it, you can follow us on https://twitter.com/PR0J3CT0_01.

It's in Spanish, in spite of that, we will make an english version of it.

If you have any question or suggestion, you can contact me in https://twitter.com/Pr0j3ct0ador.

I'm the programmer, but the game is not only done by my.
